price: (Ne fie hͻfoͻ no) kaa sε: ”Nokorε sε wowͻ wo tete mfomsoͻ no ara mu”.
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ إِنَّكَ لَفِي ضَلَٰلِكَ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi innaka lafī ḍalālika al-qadīmi
